ComicInfo.Summary:
Detective Amy Sun has tapped into a vision from the distant past — but does it contain a clue about the true nature of The Ribbon Queen? Somehow, Detective Amy Sun has channeled a vision from the distant past. Barbarian raiders sack a village and chase two women into the wilderness, only to encounter the avenging spirit of the Ribbon Queen. Is this merely a dream? Or is this haunting message from across the centuries intended to show Amy the power of the being she’s been hunting?
